item.title: Twitter Chall
item.description: Last week while browsing on X I stumbled upon this challenge. Knowing the author and his love for connection pools I wanted to give it a shot and I was able to get the first blood ðŸ©¸. The challenge source code is pretty minimal and easy to understand. From the description of the challenge we can get an idea of what awaits us. CHALLENGE INTRODUCTION We are presented with a website with 2 routes and a middleware:

item.title: SekaiCTF 2024
item.description:
HTMLSANDBOX

KEY POINT

  • Create arbitrary html documents but you have to:
  • Set csp to default-src none
  • Event handlers and tags massive blacklist
  • Content-Type miss charset informations
  • ISO-2022-JP shenigans
  • Chrome content-type sniffing
